item.title: LV-Data v3.5.1.1
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.5.1.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Sat, 21 Jan 2023 14:27:01 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.5.1]
- Issue #92: Add rudimentary support for AWS CLI (alpha)
- Issue #93: Harmonize parsing data from dat, TDMS with multiple groups, folder of TDMS
- Issue #94: Fix issue with saving a TDMS file where a TDMS file already exists
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.6.2.1
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.6.2.1
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 01 Dec 2022 15:26:55 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

[SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.6.2]
- Issue #66: Improve Lockin_sweep: UI controls, R graph plots and plot legend
- Issue #67: Improve Continuous B Sweep UI
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.6.1.2
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.6.1.2
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Nov 2022 11:38:51 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi

[SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.6.1]
- Issue #54: Fix R2/R4 G2/G4 plot labels in Lockin_sweep
- Issue #55: better support for calling lockin_sweep as a subVI of Sweep Control and Continuous B Sweep
- Issue #56: Confirm Control Experiment shutdown
- Issue #61: Add write accessor for device (Mini Control Experiment)
- Issue #62: Fix R vs T and B graphs in Lockin_time
- Issue #64: fix issue with graphing a sweep that does not use the first sweep channel
- Modify API methods for reading json-formatted metadata from TDMS files
item.dc:creator: Levylab

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi

- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.10.3
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.10.3
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 19 Oct 2022 11:29:13 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - change Set Magnet deadband to 1 Oe
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Oxford-VRM v1.6.7.2
item.description:
Product: Oxford-VRM v1.6.7.2
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 14 Oct 2022 13:57:51 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for controlling the Oxford VRM PS that controls the CF900's 3D magnet

Release Notes: - Update to Instrument Framework v1.12.3
- Change UI's getAll to use send message to process (and not wait for response)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.6.0.1
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.6.0.1
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 30 Sep 2022 15:01:43 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi

[SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.6.0]
- Issue #5, #34, #36: IV is deprecated; the preferred transport VIs are Lockin_sweep and Lockin_time
- Issue #31: Lockin_time saves a tdms file rather than a *.dat
- Issue #33, #37: Improved control of 2- and 4-terminal resitance or conductance
- Issue #38: Lockin_time configures itself to save the same number of channels that the lockin is configured for
- Issue #47: Improved instrument configuration inside Control Experiment.vi
- Issue #48: Improved axis labels and sweep definition
- Issue #50: Add emergency stop and smooth sweep to start in Lockin_sweep
- Issue #51: Fix writing sweep parameters only to first file
- Issue #52: Vtg (top gate) now available as default option in Control Experiment.vi
- Issue #60: JSON-formatted metadata now saved in inside the TDMS files (in a metadata/group property field) rather than in sidecar files
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.10.1
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.10.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 19 Sep 2022 12:46:12 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - Extensive refactoring:
- PPMS:Process.vi now handles all communication with the hardware (QD Insrtrument Server)
- Handle Command.vi and Handle getAll.vi now forward messages to the PPMS:process.vi and responds with data on the class wire as needed
- Remote API is unchanged

- Minor UI changes
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.9.7
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.8.9.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Sat, 17 Sep 2022 14:40:21 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: - FIx issue with application startup
- Rename simulation mode PPMSim

- Update to Instrument Framework v1.12.5
- Give simulation mode its own port number
- UI keeps remote connection open
- Add error handling to UI to close and re-open bad ZMQ connection
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
